email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your recent inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for this route. She’s a 150,000 DWT tanker with an LOA of 280 meters. The starting freight quote is in the low 50s ($50.75 per ton). Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you come down to the mid-40s? Also, what’s the laycan for this vessel? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your concerns about the rate. After discussing with the owner, we can offer $48.50 per ton. The laycan for the MV Ocean Star is October 15-20. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $48.50 sounds more reasonable. We can proceed with that rate. Can you confirm the demurrage terms? Also, please send over the full vessel details and any additional terms for review. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that the rate works for you. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. I’ve attached the full vessel details and charter party terms for your review. Let me know if you need any clarifications. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the details. Everything looks good on our end. Let’s proceed with the MV Ocean Star at $48.50 per ton, with laycan October 15-20. Please confirm the fixture and send over the final contract. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, confirmed! The MV Ocean Star is fixed for your cargo at $48.50 per ton, with laycan October 15-20. I’ll send over the final contract shortly. Thanks for your cooperation, and let me know if you need anything else. Best, Sarah
